survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Plant Care Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with subscription-based plant care services, including delivery, product quality, and customer service.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through the subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly formatting.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the plants received through the subscription service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following plant care services do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse service usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following plant care services do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Use a 5-point scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the subscription service?

questions.question_text: How often do you use the additional plant care resources provided (e.g., tips, guides, consultations)?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Plant care tips and guides' or 'One-on-one plant care consultations' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Conditional question based on Q2 responses. Use a single-choice format.

script.question_text: How often do you use the additional plant care resources provided (e.g., tips, guides, consultations)?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Plant care tips and guides' or 'One-on-one plant care consultations' in Q2
